analysis.description:
ITVKey (/unique_chucks/15/0xac851fd3c969f24acb688abba158703279fe6856.sol#90-98) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-transferFrom (/unique_chucks/15/0xac851fd3c969f24acb688abba158703279fe6856.sol#91-92)

Reentrancy in TVLottery.checkCollection (/unique_chucks/15/0xac851fd3c969f24acb688abba158703279fe6856.sol#200-218):
	External calls:
	- (id,typeId) = IArtefact(collection.tokens[i]).artefacts(elementsIds[i]) (/unique_chucks/15/0xac851fd3c969f24acb688abba158703279fe6856.sol#204-205)
	- require(bool)(IArtefact(collection.tokens[i]).ownerOf(id) == msg.sender) (/unique_chucks/15/0xac851fd3c969f24acb688abba158703279fe6856.sol#207-212)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- usedElements (/unique_chucks/15/0xac851fd3c969f24acb688abba158703279fe6856.sol#213-214)

Reentrancy in TVLottery.getKey (/unique_chucks/15/0xac851fd3c969f24acb688abba158703279fe6856.sol#182-200):
	External calls:
	- checkCollection(collection,elementIds) (/unique_chucks/15/0xac851fd3c969f24acb688abba158703279fe6856.sol#193)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- chests (/unique_chucks/15/0xac851fd3c969f24acb688abba158703279fe6856.sol#193-198)

Reentrancy in TVLottery.onERC721Received (/unique_chucks/15/0xac851fd3c969f24acb688abba158703279fe6856.sol#158-174):
	External calls:
	- (chestId) = ITVKey(TVKeyAddress).keys(_tokenId) (/unique_chucks/15/0xac851fd3c969f24acb688abba158703279fe6856.sol#161-163)
	- ITVKey(TVKeyAddress).transferFrom(this,lottery.bank,_tokenId) (/unique_chucks/15/0xac851fd3c969f24acb688abba158703279fe6856.sol#165-166)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- chests (/unique_chucks/15/0xac851fd3c969f24acb688abba158703279fe6856.sol#167-168)
	- lotteries (/unique_chucks/15/0xac851fd3c969f24acb688abba158703279fe6856.sol#166-167)

TVLottery.onERC721Received (/unique_chucks/15/0xac851fd3c969f24acb688abba158703279fe6856.sol#158-174) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-ITVToken(TVTokenAddress).transferFrom(lottery.bank,_from,reward) (/unique_chucks/15/0xac851fd3c969f24acb688abba158703279fe6856.sol#169-172)

TVLottery.checkCollection has external calls inside a loop:
	- (id,typeId) = IArtefact(collection.tokens[i]).artefacts(elementsIds[i]) (/unique_chucks/15/0xac851fd3c969f24acb688abba158703279fe6856.sol#204-205)

TVLottery.checkCollection has external calls inside a loop:
	- require(bool)(IArtefact(collection.tokens[i]).ownerOf(id) == msg.sender) (/unique_chucks/15/0xac851fd3c969f24acb688abba158703279fe6856.sol#207-212)
